Solscan Llama Python API Tutorial

This tutorial aims to be a quick guide to get you started using the Solscan API integrated into messari’s python library.

[1]:

from messari.solscan import Solscan
ss = Solscan()

get_last_block

[2]:

last_block = ss.get_last_block()
last_block

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
HTTPError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)

     51             response = self.session.get(endpoint_url, params=params, headers=headers)
---> 52             response.raise_for_status()
     53             return response.json()

/usr/local/Cellar/jupyterlab/3.1.9/libexec/lib/python3.9/site-packages/requests/models.py in raise_for_status(self)
    952         if http_error_msg:
--> 953             raise HTTPError(http_error_msg, response=self)
    954

get_chain_info
